install.name: AcyMailing Tag : redSHOP Products
install.author: redweb.dk
install.description: This plugin enables you to add redSHOP Products in your Newsletter

param.default:
Note: Available template tags for this plugin.
{product_thumb_image} {product_name} {product_price}.
No other tag will work with this plugin.

param.name: product_template
param.query: SELECT template_id AS tm_value, template_name AS tm_title FROM #__redshop_template WHERE template_section='product_content_template'
param.label: Product Template
param.description: Select Product Template from Product Content template section
